name: eleventy-webpack-blog
description: A starter repository for a blog web site using the Eleventy static site generator.

scripts.dev: npm run-script clean:project; concurrently "webpack --env=dev --progress --profile --colors; webpack-dev-server --env=dev" "npx eleventy --watch"
scripts.build: npm run-script clean:project; cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --env=prod --progress --profile --colors; --progress --profile --colors; JEKYLL_ENV=production npx eleventy
scripts.clean:project: if [ -e _data/manifest.json ]; then rm -R _data/manifest.json; fi; if [ -e _site ]; then rm -R _site; fi; if [ -e bundles ]; then rm -R bundles; fi
